title: Cotton goods
creator_credit: Eastman Teaching Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Shows the picking, ginning, bailing, and sale of cotton; the carding, twisting, and drawing of yarn; the production of thread; the weaving and testing of cotton fabrics; and some of the multiple uses of cotton in everyday life.
creator_credit_for_label: Eastman Teaching Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
